resources:
MIUI Backup 
备份手机里安装的程序文件和程序产生的数据。如：游戏和游戏进度存档。

此备份存放在SD卡的MIUI_backup/AllBackup目录下。 Backup Applications Backup files are compressed 确认备份以下内容吗？ Cleaning up temporary files Select backup contents Checking for available space, please wait... No backups found! Backup items failed： There was a problem with the backup, the operation was not valid. Backup completed Backup items 个程序g> 类系统数据 Backing up... Backup post-processing... (Latest) Backup current System Confirm you wish to backup System? 
打包备份手机里所有的东西（不包含SD卡）。

注意：
本操作会在恢复模式下自动完成，所以需要重启手机。
由于操作比较复杂需要较长时间。

此备份存放在SD卡的MIUI_backup/SysBackup下。 Backing up System please wait... Total size of backup file: 备份成功的项目有： Backup System Data 
快速备份联系人、短信、设置等系统程序数据。

此备份存放在SD卡的MIUI_backup/SysDataBackup目录下。 (Added) Nothing selected for backup, cancelling... 所选备份将被删除，确认？ 取消 删除 Backup Cancel OK Restore Select All Deselect Delete Backup 
Backup will be removed, please confirm? Deleting backup, please wait... 

备份手机里安装的程序文件和程序产生的数据。如：游戏和游戏进度存档。 

打包备份手机里所有的东西（不包含SD卡）。

注意：
本操作会在恢复模式下自动完成，所以需要重启手机。
由于操作比较复杂需要较长时间。 

快速备份联系人、短信、设置等系统程序数据。 此备份存放在SD卡的MIUI_backup/AllBackup/ 此备份存放在SD卡的MIUI_backup/SysDataBackup/ Delete 批量删除 Confirm you wish to restore? （注意：恢复联系人之前需要先手工建立原来的账户） Restore has failed： Restore completed Restoring... Restore the entire System System backup will be restored, the phone requires reboot, please confirm Ready to restart for restore... Restore System, requires restart No content was selected for restore Restore successful： Backup content: Backup files are being extracted... No content was selected for System restore SD Card not found or unmounted! 开始备份 Apps 整机备份 System Wi-Fi Settings
